interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: GLOW BOOSTER SERUM
Review Date: 2021/03/05
Store: Catrice
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Glow', 'Scent': 'Pineapple', 'Brand': 'Catrice', 'Item Form': 'Serum'}
Review Text: This is more of an oil than a serum in my opinion. It does absorb immediately and does not smell strong like many vitamin C serums. It smells very light and fresh with the slightest citrus scent to it. Great to use for both day and night. Does not contain a sunscreen, so make sure to use one during the day. Overall, highly recommended.
Review Title: More of an oil
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
[miclan] Honey Black Rice Moisturizing Mask 10pcs - Mediheal Family Brand Facial Sheet Mask Full of Moisturizing Revitalize Skin with Black Rice and Honey
miclan
{'Package Dimensions': '8.07 x 4.41 x 1.54 inches; 11.99 Ounces'}
These are real Korean face masks from a great brand. I first discovered this brand from a subscription box and am now hooked. The box contains 10 masks and each are individually wrapped. They have a generous amount of serum in each. Great as a weekend treat at home after a bath. Overall, highly recommended!
Great face masks!
Travel Bottles Keychain, 1.7oz/50ml Portable Hand Sanitizer Bottles, Fine Mist Spray Keychain Bottles, Empty Leakproof Refillable Containers with Flip/Spray Cap Plastic Travel Bottles (5PC)
XITENBAO
{'Brand': 'XITENBAO', 'Material': 'Silicone,Plastic', 'Capacity': '50 Milliliters, 1.7 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Special Feature': 'Portable, Mist Spray, Leakproof', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 7 x 2.5 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'klp-001', 'UPC': '192408404112'}
I use this to fill with rubbing alcohol to use as hand sanitizer. I clip it to my bag and use the sprayer to disinfect shopping carts as well. Super handy. They sprayer works very well and does not get clogged. Overall, highly recommended. Have filled all of them and given them to family members to utilize as well.
Perfect for hand sanitizer
Lnlofen 2Pcs Hollow Woven Headband with Clips, Fashion Braided Headbands Double Layer Twist Plait Headband Hair Tools, Double Bangs Hairstyle Hairpin for Women Girls (Brown & Black)
Lnlofen
{'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Resin', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Brand': 'Lnlofen', 'Size': '2 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Package Dimensions': '11.69 x 7.83 x 0.59 inches; 1.34 Ounces', 'UPC': '768894803793'}
This makes hair styling very easy. Looks professional, and comfortable for all day wear. The band itself is kinda fragile so you have to be careful not to bend it too far apart or it might snap. Overall, it's a good product.
Easy hair styling accessory
PINROSE Perfumes Bold Soul - Eau de Parfum Petals (Fragrance Towelettes) - Vegan, Cruelty-free, and Hypoallergenic Scent with Essential Oils - Notes of Crushed Blackberry, Tuberose, Vanilla, Cinnamon and Patchouli
PINROSE
{'Brand': 'PINROSE', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Scent': 'Bold Soul', 'Special Feature': 'Portable', 'Fragrance Concentration': 'eau_de_parfum', 'Package Dimensions': '3 x 3 x 0.05 inches; 0.49 Ounces', 'UPC': '850016075529'}
These are perfect for on the go and travel. Don't leak and the pads are nicely saturated. Great to keep in makeup bags or even as a stocking stuffer. I don't use perfume everyday, so these last me a while. Nice way to try out a fragrance before committing to a full sized bottle as well. Highly recommended.
Super convenient, great for travel.
MIZON Real Vitamin C Ampoule, Pure Vitamin C, No Water Added,10 Ingredients, Tone correction treatment, Nutrition, Face Moisturizer (1.01 fl oz)
MIZON
{'Brand': 'MIZON', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Active Ingredients': 'Vitamin C', 'Unit Count': '1.01 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.1 x 2.7 x 1.7 inches; 5.61 Ounces'}
I use this at night time as a serum before moisturizer. It smells wonderfully first if all. The texture is very thin and lightweight. It sinks into skin quickly. I do recommend wearing sunscreen during the day time as it can make your newer skin photosensitive. Overall, it's a very easy way to apply vitamin C to brighten skin and even skin tone.
Great for brightening the skin
Nail Files 16 Pcs, Double Sided Emery Board Manicure Tools for Filing Natural Gel and Acrylic Nails for Home and Salon Use
Keiby Citom
{'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Keiby Citom', 'Grit Number': '100', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 5.08 x 0.59 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '742025065137', 'Manufacturer': 'YHIT'}
These are very good nail files. They work very well, and lasts through multiple uses. I have natural nails, and I I find that the two different grits work well with smoothing edges and removing sharp corners of nails after trimming. I was replacing my old files after every use and the sand was flaking off and getting all over my floors. I did not have any problems with these doing that. Overall, it's a very high quality product and I would highly recommend it, especially for professional use.
Great nail files
CONBOLA Make Up Organizer 5 in 1 Dresser Organizer,Portable for Lipstick and Jewlry ,Makeup Organizer and Temporary Makeup Brush Holder,Multi-purpose for Girl Women.36.6cm18cm.(Blue)
CONBOLA
{'Material': 'Silicone', 'Special Feature': 'Portable', 'Color': 'Blue', 'Brand': 'CONBOLA', 'Mounting Type': 'Tabletop Mount', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Package Type': 'Standard Packaging', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '15.08 x 7.44 x 1.5 inches; 1.65 Pounds', 'UPC': '750226660013'}
This is great for minimalists or teenagers. Keeps your essentials organized. you can keep makeup brushes and a few cosmetics in it. It also keeps jewelry, hair ties and other small items organized and easy to find. The mirror is removable as well. Very nice size, and can easily be wiped clean when needed. made of a thick plastic, and the holder slots are silicone. The mirror is a glass mirror. Overall, highly recommended.
Great for minimalists
MIZON Cicaluronic Line, Cicaluronic Cleansing Balm, Makeup Remover, Centella Asiatica,Hyaluronic Acid, One Step Cleansing (2.7 fl oz)
MIZON
{'Package Dimensions': '2.99 x 2.91 x 2.05 inches; 6.74 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8809606850345'}
I have used the Farmacy cleansing balm for 3 years and this is the first time I have used another brand. I find this balm very hydrating. It removes waterproof makeup very well, has a very fresh scent and with a bit of water turns into a milky cleanser. It also comes with a scoop for sanitary use. Overall, it is a great cleansing balm at a reasonable price. Highly recommended.
Great moisturizing cleansing balm
Huxley Secret of Sahara Clay Mask Balanced Blend 4.23 fl. oz. | Korean Clay Mask to Refine Pores and Absorb Excess Oil and Sebum | Made with Moroccan Rhassoul Clay
Huxley
{'Brand': 'Huxley', 'Item Form': 'Clay', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Special Feature': 'Hypoallergenic', 'Unit Count': '4.23 Fl Oz', 'Product Dimensions': '2.68 x 2.68 x 6.97 inches; 6.38 Ounces'}
I have very sensitive dry skin, So I was worried that this would over dry and irritate my skin. First of all, it smells amazing. It smells very natural, like greenery and botanicals. This mask has ever so slightly some grit to it. It isn't the scrubbiest of exfoliating masks. The clay doesn't over dry your skin. I do not feel like my skin is tight feeling after washing my face. Overall, it feels very luxurious and relaxing. Great weekly skin treat to unwind at home. Highly recommended.
Great clay facial mask
GLOW BOOSTER SERUM
Catrice
{'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Glow', 'Scent': 'Pineapple', 'Brand': 'Catrice', 'Item Form': 'Serum'}
This is more of an oil than a serum in my opinion. It does absorb immediately and does not smell strong like many vitamin C serums. It smells very light and fresh with the slightest citrus scent to it. Great to use for both day and night. Does not contain a sunscreen, so make sure to use one during the day. Overall, highly recommended.
More of an oil

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to prioritize high-quality skincare, recently incorporating a glow booster serum into their routine, highlighting their continued interest in products that enhance skin luminosity. Their regimen remains focused on effective cleansing balms, potent brightening serums, versatile nail care tools, and functional beauty organization products.

- **Brand Loyalty:** The user displays loyalty to reputable brands while remaining open to innovative products that promise practical benefits. Their experience with a serum reflects a willingness to try new textures and formulations to achieve desired results.

- **Usage Context:** The user appreciates products that enhance their self-care practices, emphasizing hydration, effectiveness, and sensory appeal. Their recent experience with a serum suggests enjoyment of lightweight formulas that support daily skincare routines.

- **Product Characteristics:** The user values high-performance and user-friendly beauty items. They favor products that seamlessly integrate into their routines and offer additional benefits, such as hydration and natural scents.

- **Overall Satisfaction:** The user maintains a strong commitment to quality and functionality, as indicated by high ratings across categories. They enjoy self-care experiences that blend convenience and luxury, while continually adapting their collection to fit their evolving lifestyle needs.

Overall, the user is focused on enriching their skincare regimen with effective, sensory-enhancing products that contribute to a holistic self-care experience while enjoying the exploration of new formulations.
